```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,message = FALSE)
options(scipen=5)
library(RSQLite)
```
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
source("../DATA/movavg.R")
db <- db <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(),dbname= "../COVIDDB/COVID.sqlite3")
df <- dbGetQuery(db,"select * from ECDC")
df <- subset(df,Countries =="USA" & Cases >0 )
df$Reported <- as.Date(df$Reported)
str(df)

```
```{r}
US <- subset(df,Reported >="2020-04-01")
summary(US$Cases)
summary(US$Deaths)
US$MA14 <- movingAverage(US$Cases,14)
plot(US$Reported,US$Cases,type="l",main="USA's COVID-19 Cases Apr. 1,2020 - Aug. 14, 2020")
lines(US$Reported,US$MA14,col="red")
grid(col="black")
```
```{r}
US <- subset(df,Reported >="2020-04-01" & Reported <="2020-08-08")
US$Deaths14 <- movingAverage(US$Deaths,14)
plot(US$Reported,US$Deaths,type="l",main="USA's COVID-19 Deaths Apr. 1,2020 - Aug. 12, 2020")
lines(US$Reported,US$Deaths14,col="red")
grid(col="black")
```

#### Non-Moving Average By Week and By Month

```{r}
US$Monthly <- as.Date(cut(US$Reported,
  breaks = "month"))
US$Weekly <- as.Date(cut(US$Reported,
  breaks = "week",
  start.on.monday = FALSE))

```
```{r}
Weekly_Cases <- aggregate(Cases~Weekly,US,FUN=sum)
Weekly_Deaths <- aggregate(Deaths~Weekly,US,FUN=sum)
Weekly_Cases$DRate <- Weekly_Deaths$Deaths/Weekly_Cases$Cases
Weekly_Cases$PredDeaths <- Weekly_Cases$Cases* .091

```
```{r}
barplot(Cases ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Cases,main="USA's Weekly Barplot of Cases")
grid(col="black")
barplot(Deaths ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Deaths,main="USA's Weekly Barplot of Deaths")
grid(col="black")

barplot(DRate ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Cases,main="USA's Weekly Deaths Rates \n (max death rate = 9% week of Apr.4, 2020) ")
grid(col="black")

barplot(PredDeaths ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Cases,main="USA's Estimated Weekly Deaths \n (predicted deaths = max date rate * deaths)")
grid(col="black")
```

###  Monthly Deaths Rate i.e. Deaths/Cases

```{r}

Monthly_Cases <- aggregate(Cases~Monthly,US,FUN=sum)
Monthly_Deaths <- aggregate(Deaths~Monthly,US,FUN=sum)
Monthly_Cases$DRate <- Monthly_Deaths$Deaths/Monthly_Cases$Cases
Monthly_Cases$PredDeaths <- Monthly_Cases$Cases* .066

```
```{r}
barplot(Cases ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Cases,main="USA's Monthly Barplot of Total Cases")
grid(col="black")
barplot(Deaths ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Deaths,main="USA's Monthly Barplot of Total Deaths")
grid(col="black")

barplot(DRate ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Cases,main="USA's Monthly Deaths Rates  ")
grid(col="black")

barplot(PredDeaths ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Cases,main="USA's Monthly Estimated Deaths")
grid(col="black")
```

### Weekly and Montly Mean COVID-19 Cases And Deaths

```{r}
Weekly_Cases <- aggregate(Cases~Weekly,US,FUN=mean)
Weekly_Deaths <- aggregate(Deaths~Weekly,US,FUN=mean)
```
```{r}
barplot(Cases ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Cases,main="USA's Weekly Barplot of Mean Cases")
grid(col="black")
barplot(Deaths ~Weekly,data=Weekly_Deaths,main="USA's Weekly Barplot of Mean Deaths")
grid(col="black")
```
```{r}
Monthly_Cases <- aggregate(Cases~Monthly,US,FUN=mean)
Monthly_Deaths <- aggregate(Deaths~Monthly,US,FUN=mean)
```
```{r}
barplot(Cases ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Cases,main="USA's Monthly Mean Barplot of Cases")

barplot(Deaths ~Monthly,data=Monthly_Deaths,main="USA's Monthly Mean Barplot of Deaths")
grid(col="black")
```
